==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=丠,𠀉,㐀}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – hill. Earlier form closer to {{zh-l|*丠}}, as in {{och-l|虛}}. Compare {{zh-l|*山}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=qiū
|c=jau1
|md=kiŭ
|mn=khu/khiu
|mn_note=khu - vernacular, khiu - literary
|w=1qieu
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,v,cls
}}

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[mound]]; [[hill]]
# [[grave]]
# to place a [[coffin]] in a [[temporary]] [[shelter]] pending [[burial]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} {{zh-classifier|[[field]]s|t=[[plot]]}}
